text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Happy Valentine's!

text_block_list.name: Two People
text_block_list.text: Wheeeey!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
That's not it!
From me, it's chocolate cookies!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Line 'em up, line 'em up!
Mine here is cheesecake!

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Here, tiramisu over here~.

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text:
I'll leave the tart here.
I made extra, so everyone take some.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
From me, it's shrimp crackers as a palate cleanser!
They're salty!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whoa! Genius!

And so, each of them began arranging a large amount of homemade sweets on trays.
The scene was just like——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
It's a sweets buffet!
Ahaha, amazing~.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! Awesome!
Tannhauser's chocolate cookies are rainbow delicious~!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Huh!? I wanna eat some too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Helios-san's cheesecake and
Palmer-san's shrimp crackers are rainbow delicious too~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Haa~.
Valentine's is really fun after all~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Oh, that's right!

Today is Valentine's Day. As usual,
while working in the trainer's office——

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
'Oh, Trainer?
Do you have time now?'

Summoned by Matikanetannhauser
to the cafe.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Trainer, over here, over here!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: We're having a Valentine's party! It's super fun, so I was thinking maybe you'd like to join us, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's a Valentine's buffet where we lay out sweets and eat a ton!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The ones I made, those cookies... Oh right, I'll go get them!
After a while, she brought over some homemade chocolate cookies.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Sorry to keep you waiting~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm glad if they suit your taste. Please, dig in!
Just as I was about to eat them right away—

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Oh, those are rainbow horse, super delicious cookies!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Actually, Tannhauser, you were standing in front of the cookies wondering, 'Which one looks the tastiest~'...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Aha, so that's what it was.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh!? N-no, I just wanted you to have the tastiest one, like normal!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Come on, just eat them already, Trainer!
Matikanetannhauser's cookies were, true to rumor, crispy and crumbly and very delicious.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: By the way, Tannhauser, did you prepare something for your assigned trainer?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh, of course I did. I made macarons.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: What, you made them separately!? You're really putting in the effort~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: E-effort!? N-no, that wasn't my intention!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: And macarons...!? Those are super hard to make! You're going all out~!

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Wait, you know, sometimes the sweets you give on Valentine's have special meanings, right?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Really!?

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text: Cookies for us, and macarons for the trainer...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: ...Hmm?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I shouldn't have said that...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: When I give it to the trainer, I feel like I'll get weirdly nervous...
After school on Valentine's Day, Matikanetannhauser, looking somewhat sullen, came to visit the trainer's room.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...H-hello, excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh, nothing at all! Nothing's wrong, I'm fine!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: A-anyway, here, take this! Happy Valentine's!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: They're macarons with less sugar. I hope they suit your taste.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And then...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Um, please don't look up the meaning of giving macarons or anything! It was just a coincidence, really~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Absolutely not!
Being told that makes me curious... but anyway, the macarons I received were very carefully made and extremely delicious.
